PropertyValue.Value: select bmai.maintain_area_name,t.maintain_area_id,bsi.station_cn_name,bsi.station_id,t.update_operator,t.update_date,t.update_time from maintain_area_station_info t left join basi_maintain_area_info bmai on bmai.maintain_area_id = t.maintain_area_id left join basi_station_info bsi on bsi.station_id=t.station_id
